p: Coriander essential oil was obtained using a traditional hydrodistillation method, using a Deryng apparatus. To a 1 L round flask, 400 mL of water was added and 100 mL of coriander cold pressed oil. The flask was heated and boiling water provided steam to distill off essential oil from cold pressed oil. A total of 7.8 mL of essential oil was collected after 2 h distillation.
